original_solution_mapping.L1: He wants to serve 5 shrimp per guest and will have 40 guests so he needs 5*40 = <<5*40=200>>200 shrimp
original_solution_mapping.L2: Each pound of shrimp has 20 shrimp and he needs 200 shrimp so he needs 200/20 = <<200/20=10>>10 pounds of shrimp
original_solution_mapping.L3: The shrimp is $17.00 per pound and he needs 10 pounds so he will spend 17*10 = $<<17*10=170.00>>170.00 on shrimp

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1743.
    Returns: the total cost Wayne will spend on the appetizer.
    """
    # L1
    shrimp_per_guest = 5 # 5 shrimp per guest
    num_guests = 40 # 40 guests
    total_shrimp_needed = shrimp_per_guest * num_guests

    # L2
    shrimp_per_pound = 20 # each pound has 20 shrimp
    pounds_of_shrimp_needed = total_shrimp_needed / shrimp_per_pound

    # L3
    cost_per_pound = 17.00 # $17.00 per pound
    total_cost = cost_per_pound * pounds_of_shrimp_needed

    # FA
    answer = total_cost
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He wants to serve {shrimp_per_guest} shrimp per guest and will have {num_guests} guests so he needs {shrimp_per_guest}*{num_guests} = <<{shrimp_per_guest}*{num_guests}={total_shrimp_needed}>>{total_shrimp_needed} shrimp

Each pound of shrimp has {shrimp_per_pound} shrimp and he needs {total_shrimp_needed} shrimp so he needs {total_shrimp_needed}/{shrimp_per_pound} = <<{total_shrimp_needed}/{shrimp_per_pound}={pounds_of_shrimp_needed}>>{pounds_of_shrimp_needed} pounds of shrimp

The shrimp is ${cost_per_pound} per pound and he needs {pounds_of_shrimp_needed} pounds so he will spend {cost_per_pound}*{pounds_of_shrimp_needed} = $<<{cost_per_pound}*{pounds_of_shrimp_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on shrimp

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: He wants to serve 40 shrimp per guest and will have 40 guests so he needs 40*40 = <<40*40=1600>>1600 shrimp
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Each pound of shrimp has 20 shrimp and he needs 1600 shrimp so he needs 1600/20 = <<1600/20=80>>80 pounds of shrimp
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: The shrimp is $17 per pound and he needs 80 pounds so he will spend 17*80 = $<<17*80=1360>>1360 on shrimp

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'num_guests' (40) was used instead of 'shrimp_per_guest' (5).
